1.title: Camaro That Cares
1.plot: Marc and Tommy team up with WD-40 and UTI to build a '67 Camaro for charity.

2.title: A-Body Massage
2.plot: How to massage body panels to perfection before paint. Also, installing Holley's newest fuel injection on a vintage Mustang.

3.title: Hard Charger
3.plot: A good find: Marc and Tommy go on the hunt for a certain top-shelf Mopar that they hope to get in driveable condition for a car show.

4.title: The Highwayman - Odds & Ends
4.plot: The guys button up the last few details on their 1100 horsepower Mercury Monster and take her for a spin.

5.title: Hard Charger: Heavy Metal
5.plot: The Detroit Muscle Dodge Charger needs some sheet metal replaced, learn how to perform automotive archaeology as well as do repairs to some 48 year old body panels.

6.title: Hard Charger: Four on the Floor
6.plot: The 69 Dodge Charger's transmission is in need of a rebuild, find out how to revamp a muscle-era Mopar four speed.

7.title: Hard Charger: 440 Magnum
7.plot: Project Hard Charger, the '69 Dodge Charger project, needs an engine rebuild. The guy have to tear it down to see if the bottom end can be salvaged and what to do about it.

8.title: Hard Charger: Stop and Turn
8.plot: Muscle Cars are known as straight-line monsters, but can a few modifications make a 69 Charger a lot more nimble? Find out how to upgrade a classic Mopar's turn and stop capabilities.

9.title: 72 Chevelle: Baby Blue
9.plot: A frame-off Chevelle Barn find restoration continues with a dazzling metallic baby blue paint job. Learn how to setup a spray gun if you're interested in laying down color on your own ride.

10.title: Hard Charger: Magic Legs
10.plot: The 69 Charger Resto Project needs a rear end rebuild, find out how to beef up your ride's differential with some top shelf parts. Also, "The Highwayman" Mercury Marquis takes a road trip with a celebrity sighting.

11.title: Drift Mustang: A Recipe for Mayhem
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

21.title: Barn FIND CHEVELLE FUEL SYSTEM AND EXHA
21.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

22.title: CADILLAC CTSV HAMMER IT HOME
22.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Trans Am Transformation
1.plot: Morphing a Firebird into a Trans Am.

2.title: Bulletproof Poncho
2.plot: Building a 500 horse pump gas Pontiac.

4.title: Stout Differential
4.plot: How to build a posi-traction rear end.

5.title: Quadra-Jet Fix
5.plot: Overhauling the legendary Carter AFB 4 barrel carb.

6.title: Tough As Nails Trans Am
6.plot: Modifying Rear Suspension and Frame for Big Power.

7.title: 1969 Car Wars
7.plot: The year of the Hemi, the COPO & the Cobra Jet.

8.title: Black Beauty
8.plot: Ebony paint & flaming TA Bird graphic treatment.

9.title: Beautiful Black Bird
9.plot: Guest builder Chris Ryan coats our Tribute Trans Am with ebony paint then the guys apply the massive gold bird decal.

10.title: Interior Creature Comforts
10.plot: How-to soundproof and refurbish a worn-out interior plus, how to make a shaker hood scoop functional.

11.title: Firebird Finale
11.plot: Big inch Pontiac TA gets tuned on the chassis dyno and how to dial in your alignment without going to a shop.

12.title: Plain Pony to Fastback
12.plot: Mustang guru Alan Shepley and the guys perform major cosmetic surgery converting a stock '67 coupe into an iconic fastback.

13.title: 427 Cobra Replica: All Girls Build
13.plot: Top auto industry females build a replica of the legendary 427 Cobra with a Factory Five Racing Mark lV Roadster kit.

14.title: Grocery Gladiator: Blown Magnum
14.plot: The guys supercharge and upgrade exhaust turning a plain Jane Dodge Magnum wagon into a stealthy street fighter.

15.title: Grocery Gladiator: Smooth Shave
15.plot: We lower our Dodge wagon, shave its roof rack, install a fresh air hood and apply an accent paint job.

16.title: Go with the Flow: Performance Pump Tech
16.plot: Money Saving How-To: rebuilding fuel, water and oil pumps for more muscle car performance and reliability.

17.title: Glass Tech 101
17.plot: Tech secrets, tips and techniques on how-to restore, repair, and replace automotive glass.

18.title: Hurst Olds: Panel Gap Perfection
18.plot: Long term Hurst Olds project returns for sheet metal tech: how-to create perfect hood, fender and door gaps.

19.title: Hurst Olds: Aluminum Air Box
19.plot: How to fabricate a custom functional aluminum forced-air intake system to feed our LSX 454.

20.title: Project Ultra Violet: '70 Challenger
20.plot: Team kicks off new resto-mod project with rare, but rusted Mopar that gets a rotisserie ride to the blaster.

21.title: Project Ultra Violet: Roof Skin
21.plot: Team salvages rotted out '70 Challenger with how-to weld in a new metal roof, drip rails and A-pillars.

22.title: Project Ultra Violet: Framed
22.plot: Chassis guru Jeff Schwartz brings in his G-Machine chassis to convert uni-body Challenger to a full frame.

23.title: Project Ultra Violet: Body Beautiful
23.plot: Final Mopar sheet metal tech - how to weld in a new trunk pan and fabricate a front cowl panel from scratch.

1.title: Project Banana Split - Deadly Doors
1.plot: Old school sheet metal tricks to convert classic '49 Ford into a custom with suicide doors.

2.title: Punch Job
2.plot: How to convert from manual door handles to electric door poppers and punch custom hood louvers in a vintage Ford.

3.title: Crazy Hemi
3.plot: Team grafts world's first low deck, all aluninum Hemi and T56 six speed gearbox into '70 Challenger resto-mod.

4.title: Custom Headlights & Tail Lamps
4.plot: Hands on tech on how to graft in '55 Olds lamps, convert to 12v blue dot taillights and french-in license plate.

5.title: Shaker Secrets
5.plot: The team shows how to find and install Mopar's iconic Shaker hood on 70 Hemi Challenger restomod.

6.title: Peaked and Shaved
6.plot: How to customize a classic '49 Ford front end by bull-nosing and peaking the hood and building one-off bumpers.

7.title: Rub-a-dub Mini Tub
7.plot: Step-by-step tech on how-to mini tub a muscle car rear end to create clearance for massive tires.

8.title: Banana Split: Turn & Stop
8.plot: Guys convert ancient king pins and drums to spindles and discs to lower and slow down our flathead Ford.

9.title: Banana Split: Skirts & Paint
9.plot: Team fabs custom fiberglass bubble skirts and lays down a two-tone paint job on our old school '49 Ford custom.

10.title: Gen 6 Mustang: Blown GT
10.plot: Guys test stock 2015 Mustang V8 and then force-feed it 627 HP with a Ford Racing supercharger kit.

11.title: Gen 6 Mustang: Suspension
11.plot: New Mustang gets trick independent rear suspension mods from Ford Racing to handle 600+ HP Coyote V8.

12.title: Project: Ultra Violet
12.plot: Celebrity builder Chris Ryan shows how-to lay down metallic paint and graphics on our very purple Challenger.

13.title: Flatheads Rule
13.plot: Team transplants hopped up 3-duce flathead into old school custom plus how-to covert from 6 to 12 volt electrics.

14.title: Peaked and Shaved
14.plot: How to customize a classic '49 Ford front end by bull-nosing and peaking the hood and building one-off bumpers.

15.title: Athletic A-Body
15.plot: Team tightens up Gen 2 Chevelle with 1" drop spindles, coil springs, sway bars and rear disc brake upgrade.

16.title: Skirts, Spinners & Wide Whites
16.plot: 49 custom gets bubble skirts, fresh chrome, Sombrero caps and whitewalls, plus acid-porting cast iron manifolds.

17.title: Mopar Makeovers
17.plot: Team fabs high flow EFI fuel system, serpentine belt drive and dual fan cooling system for '70 Hemi Challenger.

18.title: Hot Rod How-to: Interiors
18.plot: Secrets on fabricating a custom interior and how muscle car sheet metal panels are made and tested.

19.title: Pain in the Glass
19.plot: It's tips on how to custom fabricate and fire-cut auto glass, plus tricks on how-to rebuild a manual window assembly.

20.title: Resto-Mod Interior
20.plot: How to upgrade a Mopar interior with performance seats, a custom dash insert, plus secrets on salvaging electrical switches.

21.title: Fire in the Hole
21.plot: We fire up Banana Split and install old school exhaust flame throwers plus how to get your college degree in racing.

22.title: Rust Be Gone
22.plot: How to replace quarter panels and fenders on a '68 Camaro with all-new sheetmetal, plus install a cowl hood.

23.title: Mission: Transmission
23.plot: The guys show tips and tricks on how to rebuild, upgrade and bulletproof a GM 700R4 automatic transmission.

1.title: Iroc and So Can You!
1.plot: Detroit Muscle Undertakes a mission to squeeze everything that they can out of a tired Iroc Z, while staying on a strict budget.

2.title: Low Buck Iroc Interior
2.plot: The guys squeeze their budget and also do some free fixes to freshen up the budget Iroc's interior, plus a road-trip test drive of the 2016 Camaro.

3.title: Ultra Violet Payoff
3.plot: Project Ultra Violet, the 1970 Challenger Pro Touring ride takes it's maiden voyage.

4.title: SEMA Mustang Thrash
4.plot: Take a look at how SEMA cars are built just a couple of weeks out from the big show.

5.title: '66 Mustang 5-Speed Fix
5.plot: How to turn an automatic first-gen Mustang into a stickshift with overdrive.

6.title: '66 Mustang Suspension Overhaul
6.plot: Learn how to make a 50-year old Mustang handle like a late model pony.

7.title: IROC Paint Overhaul and Payoff
7.plot: Learn a low-buck way to rescue faded, nasty paint. Also, the budget IROC goes for a drive.

8.title: The Highwayman: Marquis to the Max
8.plot: The Detroit Muscle guys slam over a 1,000 horsepower into a huge mid-70's Mercury with a sadistic streak.

9.title: The Highwayman: More Marquis Madness
9.plot: The Mercury build continues with ignition, exhaust upgrade and fuel system to handle a 1000 horsepower.

10.title: Renewing a Nova
10.plot: A '72 Nova gets the functional cold air hood it needed from Chevy, plus new bumpers, trim and glass.

11.title: Challenger Challenge
11.plot: Modern Challenger receives bolt-in suspension upgrades, track-capable brakes, and an IRS to handle mega horsepower.

12.title: The Highwayman: Monster Mecury
12.plot: Adding an indestructible 9-inch and air suspension to our sleeper 1,080-horse '72 Marquis Brougham.

13.title: Barn Find Bow Tie
13.plot: The guys drag a classic Chevy out of a hay barn, plus they show how to use rubberized coating and build furniture out of an old engine.

14.title: Powerstop Challenger: Twin Turbo Hemi
14.plot: The Detroit Muscle crew stuffs a twin-turbo Hemi stroker into a late-model Challenger to make monster power.

15.title: Powerstop Challenger: Final Assembly
15.plot: Marc and Tommy finish up the twin turbo install on their Challenger, then get the rest ready for its racetrack debut.

16.title: Sheetmetal Makeover
16.plot: The guys install a plethora of new body panels on their barn-find Chevelle.

17.title: Chevelle - New Legs
17.plot: The Detroit Muscle Crew Upgrades the suspension on a classic Chevelle for corner carving and high end handling.

18.title: Ultimate Challenger Payoff
18.plot: The Detroit Muscle guys pit their Ultimate Challenger project against a Hellcat at the bondurant Racing School.

19.title: Cragar Camaro Part 1
19.plot: The Detroit Muscle crew puts the spurs to a brand new Camaro SS with a forced induction install for big horsepower gains.

20.title: Cragar Camaro Part 2
20.plot: The guys upgrade a 2016 Camaro SS with nimble suspension parts, brakes, and wheels.

21.title: Barn Find Chevelle: Interior and Panel Repair
21.plot: Marc and Tommy revamp tired factory '72 Chevelle interior pieces.

22.title: Nova Fuel Injection and Street Machine Nationals
22.plot: The guys convert a carbureted small block over to port fuel injection, plus cover the Street Machine Nationals in Minnesota.

23.title: Barn Find Chevelle: Shiny Bits and Panel Fits
23.plot: How to fit panels on a classic Chevelle, as well as repairing cracked or broken fiberglass.

-1.title: Challenger Challenges
-1.plot: Resto-mod tech: how to refurbish an expensive grill, insulate a uni-body plus tips on reassembling brightwork.

imdb.title: PowerNation: Detroit Muscle
plot: Working with late-model and classic muscle cars, hosts Tommy Boshers and Marc Christ show viewers how to do step-by-step restoration and modification projects.
